results.title: Technique of the cystoscopy = Technique de la cystoscopie, cinematographique
results.brief_description:
Details the cystoscope’s function, its uses, in filming inside certain areas of the human body.
WARNING: Contains graphic biological images.

results.title: Technics
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Microcosms of the Mouth”
Describes and demonstrates the development of new methods for study of the microbial masses adhering to the teeth and soft tissues in the mouth.

results.title: Technically speaking - career futures for women
results.brief_description: Shows girls working in technical occupations. Indicates the range of jobs available, the prerequisites, work conditions, and attitudes by employers and fellow workers to girls in these jobs. Also shows how parents and teachers have discouraged girls from taking up these occupations.

results.title: Technical student
results.creator_credit: Leon Clore, Basic Films and John Fletcher
results.brief_description: Facilities for technological training in Britain today, particularly in relation to industry. The “sandwich” course typifying the cooperation being achieved between industry and education. Follows students through a four-year electronic engineering course alternating six months employment in the factory with six months study under a tutor at a technical college.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Leon Clore, Basic Films and John Fletcher

results.title: Tech Talk. Episodes 9 & 10
results.creator_credit: John Kyle, Allenog Pty Ltd and SBS-TV
results.brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. There is also a segment on survival skills The topics covered are as follows:- Zookeeper and Animal technician, Australian History Industry, Permannent part-time work in the Banking industry, Fire-fighting either with the Metropolitan Fire Brigade or Country Fire Brigade, Visual display artist, Bar attendant, Surviving in a city and Buying your fist car. The program is presented by Michael Schildberger

results.title: Tech talk. Episodes 17 & 18.
results.creator_credit: John Kyle, Allenog Pty Ltd and Channel 0\28
results.brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. Details of what various jobs entail, the neccessary qualifications and how to go about getting the job are provided. There is also a segment on survival skills. Presented by Michael Schildberger the topics covered:- customs officer, interpreter, footwear trade/manufacture, unemployment benefits/money management, secretary, cartographer/map making, glazier and youth in danger/dangers of leaving home.

results.title: Tech talk. Episodes 13 and 14
results.brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. Details of what various jobs entail, the necessary qualifications and how to go about getting the job are provided. There is also a segment on survival skills. This program presented by Michael Schildberger covers the following topics:- motor mechanic, dental assistant, supermarket worker/checkout operator, how to use the CES part 1, working in the kitchen as a chef/cook, fitter and turner, recreation officer and how to use the CES part 2.
